---ABOUT---

Castle Keys is a 2D, casual, typing game where the player has to defeat all enemies in order to become the ruler of Cat Kingdom. The player can eliminate the enemies by typing the arrow-keys labelled above the enemies’ heads to launch fireballs at them. 

Castle keys takes place in an alternate world where cats evolved instead of humans. You play as Caramel the Orange Tabby, who has recently manifested the power of fire. With his new found powers, he plans to overthrow Queen Kira the Great.

---DEVS---
